title: CPR Training and Implementation: Advanced Practical Course for Corporate Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental first-aid knowledge or basic medical education experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on workplace emergency preparedness, considering integration with job responsibilities.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) procedures according to the 2025 ILCOR guidelines.
Learners perform CPR techniques with 90% accuracy based on compression location, depth, and rate through online simulations.
Learners can delegate team roles and apply the 5-step AED protocol during workplace emergencies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
